name: SaveThis.ws
tag_list: web-button, web-actions, web-usability, semantic-web, content-monetization, lead-generation, traffic-analytics
description: Web button saving content to the cloud
overview:
SaveThis.ws is a new web button designed to automatically save page content to popular cloud services in one click.

The initial public version will be launched in February 2012, followed by participation in The Next Web conference in Amsterdam on April 25-27.

By that time, the system will offer online services the following types of website and their data:

  • Online publication (articles, blog posts, news)
  • Company website (contacts, location, events)
  • Recipes & menus (dishes, ingredients, lifestyle)
  • E-commerce store (products, books, music)
  • Entertainment reviews (movies, serials, photos)
  • Location guides (restaurants, hotels, gigs)

The startup is privately funded by its 3 co-founders.
